metadata.title: Kit: How can I provide power to the kit, is an external supply necessary?

sections.content:
Question:
How can I provide power to the kit, is an external supply necessary?
Answer:
The kit can be simply powered using the available USB type C connector.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
